pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Seahorse is a Gnome interface for GnuPG. It's main purpose is to be a PGP/GPG Key Manager, and has plugins in app-crypt/seahorse-plugins
Key Manager Features: Generating a key Deleting a key Importing keys from text or a file Exporting a key to text or a file View key properties
Key Properties Features: Show key info Change owner trust Change primary key's expiration date Change passphrase Export key Delete Key
